title: Riot Please Help me!!!!!
body:
I bought Queen ashe for discount at 487 but it charged me full price of 975 and now I cant buy more skins.
Please fix this, can I get like a refund or something.

replies.body:
Hello The13thLeo! 

It looks like Queen Ashe is one of the skins available for 50% in the Legacy Vault event. If you were charged full price, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can look into your purchased and make any necessary adjustments.
Fellow summoners, can you please move this message to the top so Riot can see it. View it, like it, comment it. Whatever. Id appreciate the support
